title: For Sale:  Smith and Wesson 500 6.5" barrel
postcontent:
Really don't wanna do it, but bills are starting to pile up due to my job situation, and my car just spun a bearing so I need the cash to buy new parts.

It's an almost new S&W 500, with a 6.5" barrel. I bought it new from a gun store in Grafton, Ohio, and since put exactly 45 rounds through it. It shoots wonderfully, and the looks you get from others at the range are priceless. Comes with 5 red "snap caps" dummy rounds, the original blue hard case, and paperwork.

I chose the 6.5 barrel for balance, sits very nice in the hand, not muzzle heavy like the 8 or 10". Recoil is very manageable for a round this size, but you don't want a hard wood grip on this, it needs the special synthetic grip to save your hands from the awesome power. This will stop anything walking or crawling on land. I was going to handload it down and use it for deer, sadly my situation forces me to part with it. There is a company online that makes 700 grain hardcast ammo that you could probably take whaling

can't take any trades because I need the cash, otherwise I'd be keeping it as it's a truly awesome firearm. I'm firm at 900 bucks, I've lowered the price 3 times already so don't lowball me please.

title: For Sale:  Custom 17" primitive Bowie By:  Geoff Keyes
location: Cary, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
If you ever wanted to own a custom knive by one of the masters before he had become famous, tripled his prices, and had a 2-year wait?  This is a early '03 primitive fighting bowie made by Geoff Keyes.  If you do a search you will find him listed (along with 5element forge) in the Knives 2012: The Worlds Greatest Knive Book.  He is listed as specializing in 19th century working, fixed blades.  A search will also reveal he doesn't have but a few knives for sale and thy are not cheap.

This example is an early bowie design (mid-18th): Spear point, appr. 12" of hand forged blade, curly maple pinned handle, spanish notch, signature file work on spine, and iron extended quillion.  this an early example of his work, before he tested for his masters.

title: For Sale:  P-64 9mm x 18 makarov Polish - Great for CCW
postcontent:
This P-64 is in very nice condition. Number match. Includes holster, 2 magazines and cleaning tool. The blue finish show some light holster wear. The bore is nice and clean. The 9mm makarov ammo is inexpensive.

Has been modified with Wolff springs to reduce recoil, double action pull and mag release force. Recoil and double action pull are the two main complaints about this gun. A stronger recoil spring makes it much more comfortable to shoot. a weaker hammer spring reduces the force required for the double action pull and makes it much easier to release the magazine.

The small size and single stack mag makes this a very nice gun for concealed carry. Fits easily in a pocket and there are various holsters available.

Face to face with Ohio resident over 21 only.

This is a very nice gun and I'm not in a hurry to sell it. The price is pretty firm. Please don't send me your ridiculous low ball offers. Also, I don't need anyone telling me what they think this gun is worth.

Zombie Blood Gun Products is a new custom gun company that specializes in high quality firearm products. Zombie Blood Gun Oil is our first product being put out to the general public! Made up of the highest quality blend, our product is the most versatile gun oil you can buy. It prevents large amounts of dirt and grime from building on exposed metal surfaces while displacing moisture from metal pores. Our product also protects internal and external metal parts from rust and corrosion. This exclusive formula provides a thin, long-lasting film that keeps actions working smoothly by reducing metal-to-metal wear.

When you apply Zombie Blood Gun Oil to your fire arm the first thing you will notice is the absence of friction. All you feel is spring tensions in the weapon. It works in incredible extremes, from desert warfare to sub-arctic temps. It also does not attract grime or dust. You will not find a better firearm lubricant bar-none. When Zombie Blood is used it is even easier to clean the weapon after long hard use. 

Zombie Blood Oil reduces wear and extends the life of firearms. It adheres well and is safe for use on all varieties of metal-to-polymer and metal -to-metal firearms. 

Great for use on your bolt, rails on semi-automatic weapons, inside the locking lug area, and inside the bolt carrier areas where carbon builds. Most of the time you will simply wipe the areas clean (mostly we at Zombie Blood use Q-tips).

High viscosity oil refined to perfection for use in firearms, fishing reels and other precision mechanisms. Does not harden gum. Gives extra-long service.

title: For Sale:  Concealed Carry Course SATURDAY!!!
postcontent:
Do you own own, or are you considering buying a handgun for personal defense?

Do you really know the laws as they pertain to the use of deadly force, carrying a firearm, home defense, defense of others? What are the elements for the use of deadly force under North Carolina General Statues? What’s meant by the term “person of reasonable firmness”? What are the assumptions made by the N.C. General Assembly in the defense of self? What are the latest changes to the law? What’s meant by “perfect defense”? 

Reading the law and having a clear understanding of it can sometimes be difficult. If you have any doubt, or hesitated when answering the above questions, you owe it to yourself to obtain the proper training. The highest caliber training that could make the difference between your freedom and facing felonious assault or homicide charges because you didn’t know or didn’t understand the law. 

Patriot Training and Consulting can help. In our concealed carry courses, you’ll be armed with a wealth of knowledge to help protect you and those you care about. 

Contact us today by visiting our website at www.PatriotTAC.com, or find us on Facebook.com under Patriot Training and Consulting.

title: For Sale/Trade:  AK-47 (NOT A WASR)
location: Fort Bragg, Spring Lake, Fayetteville, North Carolina
postcontent:
I am just putting this up to see what offers I could get. I am thinking about selling my AK-47 made by Inter-Ordnance. The model is: I.O. Inc. 10K-47C. This rifle is NOT a WASR, not by a million miles. This thing was quality built, I compared it to a WASR that I bought new (and got rid of because it wasn't up to par with this one). This rifle was 100% American built, not some cheap thrown together rifle. The rifle was made in 2008, I confirmed it by calling the manufacturer and looking up my serial number. The gun was recently DuraCoated in the color of Parker. Because this is a quality AK-47 variant, and I know the pricing this thing was originally priced at, I will not let this go for under $700. So if you are going to try and offer $699 or below, don't bother wasting our time.

The rifle will come with the following:

- 1 Brand-New, never used TapCo magazine (in plastic still)
- TapCo infusion hand guard with a tri-rail system and heat shield (top one screws on but I took it off for a better iron sight picture.)
- TapCo AK-47 style buttstock with metal buttplate.
- Un-installed scope mount bracket.
- Two 30 round magazines (steel)

***MAGPUL FORWARD ANGLE GRIP WILL NOT BE INCLUDED.

Asking for $700 for all of this. If you look up the price of the rifle as well as all of the stuff included, you'll see it's valued a few hundred less.

I can send pictures of the rest of the stuff, but if you look it up, it's going to be the same as in those pictures. I WILL NOT TRAVEL MORE THAN 20 minutes from Fayetteville and I will NOT accept a bullshit offer. Thanks for your interest.

last few (just the SKS) on gunbroker in this condition and vintage fetch close to 500-$600 plus shipping plus ffl fee.

As far as  ammo, if you can find it (black box Wolf, Non-corrosive, non-re-loadable), it goes now for about 40c a round (as it is the best hunting weight), before it disappeared it was $469MSRP for 1000rounds; so I think this is a fair price for a quick sale(give or take $420 rifle and $380 ammo, or whatever way you want to swing it :) )
and yes, that pouch with cleaning bottle and a sling are all part of the deal :).
 so, a package deal for the rifle, accessories and ammo.

title: For Sale:  Sold - Glock 23, NIB, No credit card fees, Free Shipping
postcontent:
KEELY ENTERPRISES
www.keelyarms.com

GLOCK 23 - 3rd Generation

Factory new in box
2 - 13 round magazines
NO credit card fees!!

Email us for special pricing on our Glocks below the minimum advertised pricing Glock allows or follow the link below:

http://keelyarms.com/pistol%20catalog.html



ABOUT US
We are a new FFL dealer located in Central Ohio. For years we have been selling holsters and other various accessories, but we are now excited to begin selling to you all of your favorite AR style rifles and semi-auto pistols. If you are looking for a particular gun that we do not have listed, please feel free to contact us and we will try our best to help you find it.
OUR POLICIES
Payment
Must contact within 5 days to arrange for payment
Visa, MasterCard, Discover credit cards accepted with no additional fees. Payment can be made through the auction sites shopping cart, if available. If not, we will send a link to our website's Auction/classified Listing Payment link, so that you can make a secure credit card payment.
NO ADDITIONAL FEES for credit card payments. In fact, we encourage it because it is safer and more secure for all parties involved 
Ohio residents will be charged 7.0% sales tax
Transactions requiring FFL's
Please have your FFL dealer fax or email a signed, legible copy within 5 days of the purchase to us
Make sure the FFL holder includes your name on the fax or email
We will include a copy of our FFL with the shipment
Shipping
We will ship handguns via USPS Priority mail, other items may vary
All shipments of firearms will be insured and tracking number will be provided
Shipping fee for handguns will be $20, other items will be marked individually 
Will not ship to  MD, NY, Washington DC
It is the buyer's responsibility to make sure the item purchased is legal in their area
We WILL ship to CA if the item is on the approved list and meets the state's requirements. Shipping times may increase by a couple days due to the additional paperwork required.
Warranties/Returns
New firearms carry the warranty from the manufacturer
Used firearms are sold As Is
If for some reason you believe the item you received is not as we represented, please contact us at REDACTED. We want you to be happy with your purchase!
Trades
We do not routinely accept trades, but on rare occasions we will consider them
Terms will be worked out through email/phone prior to any shipments
Once terms are agreed upon by both parties, we will send a copy of our FFL to your licensed dealer. Your dealer will ship your firearm to us. Once we receive your firearm, we will then ship the agreed upon product to your FFL dealer.
Questions
We strongly encourage you to contact us if you have any questions regarding an item you may wish to purchase. We want to make sure you have confidence in your purchase.
Our products are also for sale locally and we reserve the right to end the sale/auction early as long as there are no bids over any set reserve price.
New gun listings may use stock photos. Serial numbers in pictures may not be the same as the gun shipped.


THANKS AND HAPPY BUYING!!
